doc.title: reduceRight
doc.description: Reduces the array (from right-to-left) to a single value.

content.name: reduceRight
content.description: The reduceRight() method applies a function against an accumulator and each value of the array (from right-to-left) to reduce it to a single value.

params.description: The array to get last element.
params.name: reducer

params.description: The initial value for the reducer, defaults to subject[0].
params.name: initialValue

content.summary: Reduces the array (from right-to-left) to a single value.

args.description: The array to get last element.
args.name: reducer

args.description: The initial value for the reducer, defaults to subject[0].
args.name: initialValue
